info.name: nginx version detect
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some nginx servers have the version on the response header. Useful when you need to find specific CVEs on your targets.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: sample-next-app.fabrique.social.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Mon, 06 Sep 2021 16:37:42 GMT Etag: "c3e-157isjqyudLQlpZVf6/icn2a2/0" Server: nginx/1.17.8 Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15724800; includeSubDomains Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Powered-By: Next.js Home | sample next app

POST /graphql HTTP/1.1
Host: sample-next-app.fabrique.social.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 67
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Content-Type: application/json
Accept-Encoding: gzip

{"query":"query IntrospectionQuery{__schema {queryType { name }}}"}
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Date: Mon, 06 Sep 2021 16:39:05 GMT
Server: nginx/1.17.8
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15724800; includeSubDomains
X-Powered-By: Express
X-Request-Id: 3d64c3ca5b4ff3d6dd265cc7685958dd

{"data":{"__schema":{"queryType":{"name":"query_root"}}}}

info.name: Can I Take Over DNS - Fingerprint
author: pdteam

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 61683
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;sample-next-app.fabrique.social.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 61683
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;sample-next-app.fabrique.social.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
fabrique.social.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	ns1-06.azure-dns.com. azuredns-hostmaster.microsoft.com. 1 3600 300 2419200 300

geeknik
g4l1t0
convisoappsec

dawid-czarnecki
info.description: It searches missing security headers, but obviously, could be so less generic and could be useless for Bug Bounty.
